I am an applied Bayesian statistician working at the [Scientific Computing Program (PROCC)](http://www.procc.fiocruz.br) in the [Oswaldo Cruz Foundation (Fiocruz)](http://www.fiocruz.br). 



### Education

- PhD in statistics, [The University of Sheffield](https://www.sheffield.ac.uk/maths), UK, 2010. <BR> Under supervision of [Prof Tony O'Hagan](http://tonyohagan.co.uk/) and [Prof Jeremy Oakley](http://www.jeremy-oakley.staff.shef.ac.uk/). ([Thesis](http://etheses.whiterose.ac.uk/963/))
- MSc in statistics, [Federal University of Rio de Janeiro](http://www.dme.ufrj.br), Brazil, 2003. <br> Under supervison of [Prof Dani Gamerman]()
- BSc in statistics, [Federal University of Minas Gerais](http://www.est.ufmg.br), Brazil, 2002. Under supervison of [Prof Rosangela Loschi](http://www.est.ufmg.br/~loschi) and [Prof Cibele Silva](http://www.pgest.unb.br/docentes)

### Short bio

After finishing my PhD at University of Sheffield, UK I moved back to Brazil where I got a lecturer position in the Department of Statistics at the Fluminense Federal University where I stay until December 2012 when I started the researcher position at Fiocruz.
